snippet: “Mondo Agnelli,” a new book, tells the story of the Italian industrialist Gianni Agnelli, the struggles and the turnaround of his family’s crown jewel, Fiat, and the rescue of Chrysler.
abstract: Bryan Burrough reviews book Mondo Agnelli: Fiat, Chrysler, and the Power of a Dynasty by Jennifer Clark.
lead_paragraph: “Mondo Agnelli,” a new book, tells the story of the Italian industrialist Gianni Agnelli, the struggles and the turnaround of his family’s crown jewel, Fiat, and the rescue of Chrysler.

headline.seo: In ‘Mondo Agnelli,’ a Ride on Fiat’s Roller-Coaster — Review
headline.main: Fiat’s Rough Road, and Its Renewal
headline.print_headline: Fiat’s Rough Road, And Its Renewal
